Evolution Emulator: Species Diversification under an Evolutionary Relatedness Dependent Scenario
code: library(evesim) library(ape)  # Optionally set the number of threads. # Defaults to number of logical cores. RcppParallel::setThreadOptions(numThreads = 1)  # Simulation # In the below example, we set speciation rate to 0.5, extinction rate to 0.1 # We also set the effect sizes of species richness and evolutionary relatedness on speciation process to -0.001 and -0.001 # In the example, the effects on extinction are set to zeros pars = c(0.5, 0.1, -0.001, -0.001, 0.0, 0.0)  # With pre-set parameters, we now run a simulation to generate trees with crown age fixed at 10 time units # We use the NND (nearest neighbor distance) scenario sim <- edd_sim(pars = pars, age = 10, metric = "nnd", offset = "none")  # Simulation outputs are embedded in the 'sim' object # Plot extant tree plot(sim$tes)  # Plot complete tree plot(sim$tas)  # L table (to view the evolutionary history) sim$L

title: Simulate a phylogenetic tree using the eve model — edd_sim
text: pars numeric vector 6 parameters simulation: lambda_0 Intrinsic speciation rate (must positive larger mu_0). mu_0 Intrinsic extinction rate. beta_N Effect size species richness speciation rate (can sign zero). beta_phi Effect size evolutionary relatedness speciation rate (can sign zero). gamma_N Effect size species richness extinction rate (can sign zero). gamma_phi Effect size evolutionary relatedness extinction rate (can sign zero). age numeric value representing maximum crown age simulation stop. metric character string indicating evolutionary relatedness measure used simulation. Options : "pd" Phylogenetic diversity evolutionary relatedness measure (community-wise constraint diversification). "ed" Evolutionary distinctiveness lineage-specific measure. "nnd" Phylogenetic distance nearest neighbor lineage-specific measure. offset character string specifying method applying offset. Currently, "simtime" available, can used metric set "pd". Defaults "none". size_limit integer specifying maximum size simulation result. Defaults 10000. retry integer specifying number retry attempts case failure. Defaults 100.

title: Simulate a phylogenetic tree using the eve model — edd_sim
text: list containing following components: tes phylogeny extant lineages, NULL simulation failed retry attempts. tas phylogeny lineages, NULL simulation failed retry attempts. L L table recording historical events, NULL simulation failed retry attempts. msg character string containing error messages () accumulated retry attempts.

title: Simulate a phylogenetic tree using the eve model — edd_sim
text: function simulates evolutionary relatedness dependent diversification based specified set parameters (pars). intrinsic speciation rate (lambda_0) must positive greater intrinsic extinction rate (mu_0). remaining parameters, account effects species richness evolutionary relatedness diversification rates, can sign zero. simulation may retried multiple times (specified retry limit) failures occur execution. metric argument allows different ways measuring evolutionary relatedness, three options: phylogenetic diversity ("pd"), evolutionary distinctiveness ("ed"), nearest neighbor distance ("nnd"). using phylogenetic diversity metric, optional offset method ("simtime") available. simulation terminate specified age reached size_limit exceeded.
